alerts.description: Alert Data Stewards of review outcome
Alert US BMs of Company Ownership Review
Alert seller that Company Creation has been Rejected
Approval - Rejected Menu Pricing Request email
Company Access Request Enterprise Approved Email
Company Access Request Enterprise Rejected Email
Email Alert when Application is Approved
Email Alert when Application is Rejected
Request for Contracting Entity change has been rejected
Primary Address of Customer Account gets changed

fieldUpdates.name: Set Company Review Status as Reviewed
Set Matched with Data.com On to Today

fieldUpdates.description: Blank out Company Access Submitter on the Company.
fieldUpdates.name: UpdateCompanyCompanyAccessSub-Blank

fieldUpdates.description: IF Record Type = Partner AND Partner Level = "Reseller" or "ResellerEMEA" THEN OIC Currency Code = "USD"
fieldUpdates.name: Update OIC Curr Code to USD if Reseller
Update Partner Account Status To Pending
Update Partner Account Type to Partner
set completion progress for sub agent

outboundMessages.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to notify FMW - Create action to Create Account in CMS
outboundMessages.name: CDH_SfdcToFusion-CreateAccounts

outboundMessages.name: CDH_SfdcToFusion-UpdateAccounts

outboundMessages.name: GTMO_NewSfdcToFusion-CreateCompanies

outboundMessages.description: New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - soft delete/undelete action to Update companies in Current Salesforce & notify SFDC Cache.
outboundMessages.name: GTMO_NewSfdcToFusion-DeleteUndeleteComp

outboundMessages.description: New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - Update action to Update companies in Current Salesforce & notify SFDC Cache.
outboundMessages.name: GTMO_NewSfdcToFusion-UpdateCompanies

outboundMessages.name: NewSfdcToFusion-DeleteUndeleteAccounts

outboundMessages.description: New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Accounts) - Update action to Update Accounts in Current Salesforce & notify SFDC Cache.
outboundMessages.name: NewSfdcToFusion-UpdateAccounts

outboundMessages.description: New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - Update action to Update companies in Current Salesforce

outboundMessages.description: New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - Update action to Update companies in Current Salesforce

rules.description: This rule is created to update Account Number field with new Account Number while data load
rules.formula: NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id))

rules.description: asddddddddddd
Workflow for New Salesforce to notify FMW - Create action to Create Account in CMS
rules.formula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), NOT($User.Id=$Label.FMW_API_User), ISBLANK(RCN__c), OR( CONTAINS($Label.AccountCustomerRecordTypeId,RecordTypeId), CONTAINS($Label.AccountGovernmentRecordTypeId,RecordTypeId), CONTAINS($Label.AccountRBURecordTypeId,RecordTypeId) ) , OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Type,"Customer"), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.AccountCustomerRecordTypeId,PRIORVALUE(RecordTypeId))) ), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Type,"Former Customer") ) )

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to notify FMW - Update action to update Account in CMS
rules.formula: AND( NOT( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType) ), NOT($User.Id=$Label.FMW_API_User), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), NOT(ISBLANK(RCN__c)), NOT(ISNEW()) )

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to notify FMW - Update action to Update Account in CMS & ESS
rules.formula: AND( NOT( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType) ), NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), NOT($User.Id=$Label.FMW_API_User), OR(NOT(ISBLANK(RCN__c)),NOT(ISBLANK(DDI__c))),ISCHANGED(OwnerId) )
AND(ISCHANGED( Billing_Address_Bypassed__c ),Billing_Address_Bypassed__c)

AND(NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType)), NOT(ISBLANK( Account_Manager__c )), Account_Manager__r.IsActive = TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK(OwnerId )), Owner.IsActive = TRUE, ISCHANGED(Account_Manager__c) )

rules.description: Account owner is modified, alert the Account Manager.
rules.formula: AND(NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType)), NOT(ISBLANK(OwnerId)), Owner.IsActive = TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK( Account_Manager__c )), Account_Manager__r.IsActive = TRUE, ISCHANGED(OwnerId) )

rules.fullName: GTMO_Alert BMs of Company Creation needing Review
rules.formula: AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), OR( ISPICKVAL( Data_Steward_Approval__c ,"Pending Review"), ISPICKVAL( Data_Steward_Approval__c ,"In Progress") ), ISPICKVAL( Company_Review_Status__c ,"Escalate to BM"), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Owner.Sub_Region__c,"LATAM") ) )

rules.fullName: GTMO_Alert LATAM BMs of Company Ownership Review
rules.description: Send email to LATAM BMs when a New Company needs Ownership review
rules.formula: AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), ISPICKVAL( Company_Review_Status__c ,"Escalate to BM"), ISPICKVAL( Owner.Sub_Region__c,"LATAM") )
AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), ISCHANGED( Shipping_Address_Bypassed__c ), Shipping_Address_Bypassed__c )
AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), ISPICKVAL(Partner_Level__c, 'Sub Agent') )

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - create action to notify SFDC Cache..
rules.formula: AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), ISNEW(), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.GovernmentRecordTypes,RecordTypeId)), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)) )

rules.description: Workflow Rule for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - soft delete/undelete action to Update companies in Current Salesforce & notify SFDC Cache.
rules.formula: AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Status__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Deleted'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Deleted')), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.GovernmentRecordTypes,RecordTypeId)) )

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - Update action to Update companies in Current Salesforce & SFDC Cache.
rules.formula: AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.GovernmentRecordTypes,RecordTypeId)), NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(AND(ISCHANGED(Status__c), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Deleted'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Deleted')))) )
AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), OIC_Participant__c = True, OIC_Participant_Id__c = null)

AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, $Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType), NOT(ISBLANK(OIC_Participant_Id__c)), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), OIC_Participant__c=true, OR( AND(ISCHANGED(Partner_Level__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Partner_Level__c))) ) , AND( ISCHANGED(Primary_Member__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Primary_Member__c)) ), AND(ISCHANGED(Contract_Type__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Contract_Type__c))) ), AND(ISCHANGED(Tier_Level__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Tier_Level__c))) ), ISCHANGED(Contract_Signed_Date__c), AND (ISCHANGED(Oracle_Vendor_ID__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Oracle_Vendor_ID__c)) ), AND (ISCHANGED(Oracle_Site_Id__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Oracle_Site_Id__c))) ) )

rules.fullName: GTMO_Update OIC Currency Code to USD if Reseller or Resller EMEA
rules.description: IF Record Type = Partner Company AND Partner Level = "Reseller" or "ResellerEMEA" THEN OIC Currency Code = "USD"
rules.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = 'Partner Company', OR( ISPICKVAL(Partner_Level__c,"Reseller"), ISPICKVAL(Partner_Level__c,"ResellerEMEA" )))

rules.fullName: GTMO_Update Partner Account Status on Partner Company
rules.description: When Partner Ops/PAMs/Partner Directors manually create a partner company, the Partner Approval Status should default to "Approved".
rules.formula: AND(CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, $Label.Partner_Company_RecordTypeName), OR($Profile.Name ='Rackspace-Partner Operations', $Profile.Name ='Rackspace - PAM INTL', $Profile.Name ='Rackspace - PAM US', $Profile.Name = 'Rackspace - PAM Director INTL', $Profile.Name = 'Rackspace - PAM Director US'))

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Accounts) - Create action to Create Accounts in Current Salesforce
rules.formula: AND(NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name,$Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType)),NOT(CONTAINS($Label.GovernmentRecordTypes,RecordTypeId)), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), ISNEW() )

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Accounts) - soft Delete/Undelete action to update Accounts in Current Salesforce & notify SFDC Stash
rules.formula: AND(NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name,$Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType)),NOT(CONTAINS($Label.GovernmentRecordTypes,RecordTypeId)),NOT(ISNEW()),ISCHANGED(Status__c),OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Deleted'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Deleted')),NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)) )

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Accounts) - Update action to Update Accounts in Current Salesforce
rules.formula: AND(NOT(CONTAINS(RecordType.Name,$Label.CheckCompanyonRecordType)), NOT(ISNEW()), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.SkipUserIDs,$User.Id)), NOT(CONTAINS($Label.GovernmentRecordTypes,RecordTypeId)), NOT(AND(ISCHANGED(Status__c),OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,'Deleted'),ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status__c),'Deleted')))))

rules.fullName: Set Company Reviewed Status When Matched
rules.description: When a Company is set to one of Data.com's "Matched" statuses, automatically mark it as being Reviewed
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISNEW(), jsImpacts__Data_com_Matched__c = "Matched" ), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(jsImpacts__Data_com_Matched__c), jsImpacts__Data_com_Matched__c = "Matched" ) )

rules.fullName: Set Tracking Metrics When Reviewed Status Changes
rules.description: When the Company Review Status is changed, update the tracking metrics
rules.formula: OR( AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Company_Review_Status__c))) ), AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Company_Review_Status__c) ) )

rules.description: If the Company is ever set to be Company Review Status = Escalated to Rackspace, set the Ever Escalated to Rackspace? checkbox to true
Workflow for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - Update action to Update companies in Current Salesforce
rules.formula: AND( $User.Id != $Setup.RestrictUsersForFusionOBMs__c.Integration_User_Id__c, Old_Record_Id__c <> null , OR(ISCHANGED(Id), ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(Old_Record_Id__c), ISCHANGED(DunsNumber), ISCHANGED(AnnualRevenue), ISCHANGED(Industry), ISCHANGED( Website), ISCHANGED(Ownership), ISCHANGED(NumberOfEmployees), ISCHANGED(BillingStreet), ISCHANGED(BillingCity), ISCHANGED(BillingState), ISCHANGED(BillingCountry), ISCHANGED(BillingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(ShippingStreet), ISCHANGED(ShippingCity), ISCHANGED(ShippingState), ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry), ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(Phone)))

rules.description: Workflow for New Salesforce to FMW Integration (Companies) - Update action to Update companies in Current Salesforce
rules.formula: AND( $User.Id != $Setup.RestrictUsersForFusionOBMs__c.Integration_User_Id__c, Old_Record_Id__c <> null , OR(ISCHANGED(Id), ISCHANGED(Name), ISCHANGED(Old_Record_Id__c), ISCHANGED(DunsNumber), ISCHANGED(AnnualRevenue), ISCHANGED(Industry), ISCHANGED( Website), ISCHANGED(Ownership), ISCHANGED(NumberOfEmployees), ISCHANGED(BillingStreet), ISCHANGED(BillingCity), ISCHANGED(BillingState), ISCHANGED(BillingCountry), ISCHANGED(BillingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(ShippingStreet), ISCHANGED(ShippingCity), ISCHANGED(ShippingState), ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry), ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode), ISCHANGED(Phone)))
